channel.title: Logotherapy for Optimal Living
channel.managingEditor: logotherapy@solidgold.co.za (Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts)
channel.copyright: © Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa - all rights reserved
channel.description:
As human beings, we are essentially spiritual creatures.

We seek meaning in life, and feel complete only when we live with a sense of purpose and destiny.

Produced by https://SolidGold.co.za — #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: Logotherapy - helping people to understand and integrate meaning in their lives.
channel.itunes:author: Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts
channel.itunes:summary:

item.author: logotherapy@solidgold.co.za (Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts)
item.itunes:author: Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: Meaning in Life is Waiting to Be Found | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: Meaning in Life is Waiting to Be Found | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: Meaning in Life is Discovered, Not Created By Us
item.description:
Meaning in Life is Waiting to Be Found — Meaning in Life is Discovered, Not Created By Us Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) We experience meaning by doing what life requires of us. We discuss the three sets of values that Viktor Frankl described: Creative, Experiential and Attitudinal Values.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

Stay up-to-date with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LogotherapySA/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.itunes:author: Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: A Moral Rebirth | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: A Moral Rebirth | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: The Spiritual Dynamics of Repentance
item.description:
A Moral Rebirth — The Spiritual Dynamics of Repentance Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) Discover the life-changing power of an 'existential turn-about' when we take responsibility for our actions and repent of our wrong-doings.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

Stay up-to-date with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LogotherapySA/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.itunes:author: Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: Unconditional Love | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: Unconditional Love | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: We Never Give up on Those We Truly Love
item.description:
Unconditional Love — We Never Give up on Those We Truly Love Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) Love is the deepest experience we can have in life. It allows forgiveness and leaves the door open for us to return home.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

Stay up-to-date with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LogotherapySA/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.itunes:title: Life is a Matter of Choice | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: Our Lives are Determined by the Choices We Make
item.description:
Life is a Matter of Choice — Our Lives are Determined by the Choices We Make Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) talks about the life-changing impact of making responsible and morally-upstanding choices.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za
